bug.short_desc: RFE: Please add support for VBOX 5.1
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Issue forwarded from rpmfusion https://bugzilla.rpmfusion.org/show_bug.cgi?id=4263
Description of problem:
The update of VirtualBox 5.0 to 5.1 cause an incomatibility issue with vagrant, that depends on VirtualBox up to 5.0, but fails to run on 5.1.
There is a work-a-round for that problem, cause my vagrant did not came up anymore. Go to the vagrant installation directory
cd /usr/share/vagrant/plugins/providers/virtualbox/driver
and change the meta.rb in that way, that VirtualBox 5.1 is mapped to 5.0.
I had to update VBox to 5.1 , to support kernel 4.7 (at least in guest additions) https://bugzilla.rpmfusion.org/show_bug.cgi?id=4251#c0

Can somebody please test this scratch build?
http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=15716951
Thx.
BTW does this apply to F23 as well?

(In reply to Vít Ondruch from comment #3) > BTW does this apply to F23 as well?
Yes it does.

(In reply to leigh scott from comment #4) > (In reply to Vít Ondruch from comment #3) > > BTW does this apply to F23 as well? > > Yes it does.
Thx for confirmation.
Now if somebody can test the patch ... I don't have the environment ...
Scratch build works for me. I'm vagrant to do local ansible testing.

(In reply to Mike Goodwin from comment #6) > Scratch build works for me.
Thx for testing. I missed you comment. Building the official build.
(In reply to leigh scott from comment #4) > (In reply to Vít Ondruch from comment #3) > > BTW does this apply to F23 as well? > > Yes it does.
Here is the F23 scratch build for testing:
http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=15825157

(In reply to Vít Ondruch from comment #7) > (In reply to Mike Goodwin from comment #6) > > Scratch build works for me. > > Thx for testing. I missed you comment. Building the official build. > > (In reply to leigh scott from comment #4) > > (In reply to Vít Ondruch from comment #3) > > > BTW does this apply to F23 as well? > > > > Yes it does. > > Here is the F23 scratch build for testing: > > http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=15825157
Works fine with VirtualBox-5.1.6-1.fc23.x86_64 from rpmfusion.
Thanks.
